title: Stromboli
writer: Saskia Noort, Roos Ouwehand, Paula van der Oest
short_cast: Elise Schaap, Tim McInnerny, Christian Hillborg, Pieter Embrechts, Anna Chancellor, Neerja Naik, Taz Munyaneza, Marisa van Eyle, Adriano Chiaramida, Simone Coppo
cast: Elise Schaap, Tim McInnerny, Christian Hillborg, Pieter Embrechts, Anna Chancellor, Neerja Naik, Taz Munyaneza, Marisa van Eyle, Adriano Chiaramida, Simone Coppo
genre: Dutch, Movies Based on Books, Dramas
desc: Haunted by memories of her broken marriage and a fight with her daughter, a woman joins an intense self-help retreat when her vacation goes awry.
